text:
It would be great to enhance the Mail-Visualizer by the recognition of failed 
assertions. At the moment a Failed-Mail is send only, if the tested WebSite 
fails to respond (HTTP Code 404, 500 etc.). It would be great, if the E-Mail 
Visualizer could be set up to send a Mail, if the number of assertions exceeds 
a certain limit. By this way an E-Mail could be generated, if the WebSite 
responds technically correct (200) but has semantical errors (e.g. "Sorry, your 
request wasn't processed correctly"), This type of problem can be easily 
detected with an assertion and the adressee could then be notified by the e-
mail.
creator: stefan.klein@estradis.com
